Author: fishonthesun
Text: Like someone else said, just because you broke the streak, doesnt mean things are over or that you should fall back into it.   Instead of it being a streak where you are returned to day one, think of it like a test. Each day of the month or even the year is a different question. Today, you got one "wrong" (not trying to shame or anything I just mean in terms of the broken streak) but you still have 6 or 7 other days that are "right" and each day you dont binge or purge is a higher percentage on your test.   Anyways, great job on resisting the purge! I know how hard that is so I'm really proud of you

Author: fml2k
